ingredients.ingredient: 3 pounds small red new potatoes, halved
1 teaspoon Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 teaspoon Salt and freshly ground black pepper

cookingTips: Toss potatoes halfway through roasting for even browning
Cut potatoes to uniform size for consistent cooking
Let potatoes develop a golden crust for better flavor
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Encourage high heat roasting to achieve crispy exteriors while keeping insides tender.
